title: Truckers Need Love, Celebs Need to Sit This One Out? 3.20.20
itunes:title: Truckers Need Love, Celebs Need to Sit This One Out? 3.20.20
description:
In episode 591, Jack and Miles are joined by quarantine co-host Jamie Loftus to discuss the youth ignoring warnings, how to get the coronavirus test if you're not a celebrity or NBA player, spring break in Florida, truckers, Netflix slowing down the internet, celebrities trying to entertain us, Hallmark movies, movies dropping on VOD, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. “If I get corona, I get corona. At the end of the day, I'm not gonna let it stop me from partying”: Spring breakers are still flocking to Miami, despite coronavirus warnings. 
  2. Younger Adults Make Up Big Portion of Coronavirus Hospitalizations in U.S.
  3. FDA Urges Caution After Trump Says Malaria Drug Will Be Available to Coronavirus Patients ‘Almost Immediately’
  4. Celebrities get virus tests, raising concerns of inequality
  5. Coronavirus Cases in N.Y.C. Near 4,000; Brooklyn Count Soars: Live Updates
  6. Coronavirus comes for spring break: Locals close Florida beaches after governor refuses to.
  7. Forced Quarantines Spark Confusion and Worries About Precedent
  8. Trucking hit by coronavirus concerns, CTA stresses drivers are ‘essential service’
  9. Netflix asked to slow down streaming so the internet doesn't break
  10. Carriers suspend internet data caps during coronavirus
  11. Celebrities Sing ‘Imagine’ to Console the Little People
  12. Hallmark Channel to Start Airing Christmas Movies, Proving Time Means Nothing Now
  13. What the Coronavirus Means for Watching Movies
  14. Studio’s Movies in Theaters Will Be Offered for In-Home Rental
  15. DAILY ZEITGEIST DISCORD
  16. WATCH: Zoot Woman - Its Automatic

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
